properties.address: Cromer Community Centre, Cromer, norfolk NR27 9HN
properties.description: Cromer Friendship Hub operates from Cromer Community using the main hall, toilets and kitchen. We work with New-U to have rag rugging and other craft activities. We cater for everyone, wheel chair access plus well behaved small dogs. We have Jigsaws, Games etc. On Wednesday we have rag rugging
properties.title: Cromer Friendship Hub

properties.description: You are welcome to join us, whoever you are, on Monday morning between 10am and 12 noon for a warm welcome, a hot drink and biscuit or perhaps a scone, our treat! We open on Bank Holiday Mondays too.

properties.description: You can access most Libraries outside staffed hours with “Open Library” providing extra access to the library, its books and computers. Check if it's currently available at your local library at www.norfolk.gov.uk/openlibrary Free hot drinks available, please see our What’s On page or ask in the library for times: https://www.norfolk.gov.uk/libraries-local-history-and-archives/libraries/whats-on
properties.title: Sheringham Library

properties.description: A safe space to stay warm, have a hot drink/snack and meet new people. You’re welcome to join in with board games, read the newspaper, bring a book, your knitting, use our Wifi, chat or simply enjoy the warm space to sit & have space to be quiet. Just drop in – no need to book.
properties.title: Sheringham Salvation Army - Welcome Space
